It was almost time to go to bed in Black*Star and Tsubaki's shared home. They were curled up in sleepwear on the couch, watching an old action movie, one of Black*Star's favorites. Tsubaki wore a simple tank top and a pair of pajama pants that hugged her shapely ass. Having outgrown embarrassment the instant he was born, Black*Star was dressed only in a pair of boxer shorts (Tsubaki had long since gotten used to it, but it was getting tougher to keep her blush under control as he was getting older and actually building up quite a bit of muscle). Tsubaki sighed as the cowboy shot another henchman. Her stomach still felt rather topsy-turvy, but such things were normal after battle even without contact with the enemy. Her eyes widened as her stomach gurgled, and she felt a very much identifiable sensation, pressure gathering near her anus. She blushed pink. Black*Star didn't really care about letting off gas around her and Tsubaki didn't really mind, but she herself was raised in a proper Japanese home and was expected to be a proper lady. Farting in front of anyone, even someone as close to her soul as Black*Star, was unthinkable. She fidgeted.

"Um...Black*Star, I think I'm going to take a bath." He glanced at her, rare concern showing in his eyes. "This late? Are you sure you're feeling alright?"

Tsubaki pinkened further. 'If only he knew what it really was...'
She smiled reassuringly, "I'm fine. I'll come to bed soon, don't worry." She walked away, Black*Star's eyes panning down her back till they reached the curve of her ass as it swayed toward the bathroom. Black*Star sighed to himself.

14222221221222222212.title: The Legend of Korra

choices: No, nobody heard. She is allowed to continue enjoying herself alone.
Yes, somebody hears and comes into the room.
142222212212222222121.content:
It was a late summer evening on Air Temple Island; Korra, Asami, Bolin, Mako and many of their other friends and acquaintances had been invited by Tenzin and his family for a celebratory feast, it had been several months since the defeat of Kuvira and the restoration of peace to the world, but the nearly constant celebrating had still not let up. Of course, most of the events she'd attended had been organized by the recently crowned Earth King Wu, the man knew how to throw a party...

The cuisine of the air benders was entirely vegetarian, of course; slightly disappointing for Korra, a girl who enjoyed her protein to say the least, but Pema was an excellent cook who could bring out the best qualities of any ingredient. The meal had been a banquet of carrots, potatoes, squash, zucchini, broccoli, celery- just about every vegetable under the sun and some below it found its way onto the table. Korra, as she often did when presented with good food, overindulged in the various dishes, and found her stomach full to bursting from the meal; bloating and cramped from overconsumption

But she had a way to relieve that, a way that she enjoyed very much. She slipped away from the festivities and found her way to the most isolated wing of the temple, and the furthest most remote room, (the doors in the temple had no locks so she needed to take more drastic measures to ensure privacy.) she shut herself in and grinned to herself, rubbing her crumbling belly in anticipation. The room was very modest; two beds set up against either one of the walls, in the middle stood a small nightstand with an oil lantern. There was an open air window, but it did have a drape, which Korra pulled down, she then lay down on the rightmost bed and made herself comfortable.

She leaned back on the bed, and began performing various stretches she'd learned during her stay on the island, in particular she employed Meelo's own personal style of stretching which he'd honed to help facilitate the use of his "talent." She could feel the pressure in her abdomen beginning to loosen, and an ominous grumbling could be heard filling the small room.

Korra was a tomboy, this much was indisputable at this point, so it's perhaps not so unsurprising she took such enjoyment from the act of farting, but Korra's level of enjoyment went beyond a simple tomboyish one, she liked it to an unusual degree; she had a sort of dirty fascination with it, one might even say she had a fetish for gas. And she loved the smell of her own brand, maybe a little too much. As she was growing up she'd experimented quite often whenever she had the privacy, though with her extremely busy lifestyle that frequently had her bunking with others, too on edge to really unwind, or otherwise indisposed, she hadn't had a chance to indulge herself for a long time. Too long, she thought, and with her belly full of fumes from the scrumptious feast she'd eaten downstairs, she was going to rediscover her guilty pleasure, she couldn't stand to wait a moment longer! If anything, the fear of potentially being caught made it even better, more thrilling.

She could feel the first blast coming, but it needed some coaxing to work its way out, Korra grabbed her right knee with both hands and pulled it back almost up to her chin in an impressive display of flexibility, she strained, biting down on her lip, clenching her firm cheeks until she received payoff. A low brassy burst of gas slowly pushed out of her ass, the embarrassing but utterly satisfying sound bouncing around the walls of the room, before finishing with an airy crescendo, Korra sighed in relief, "Oooh, man, does that feel better..." she prepared to lean down over her crotch, the best part was yet to come.

But before she could, she realized something... The last time she'd done this had been so long ago, she hadn't even mastered air bending, she'd have to hurriedly huff her scent as it quickly dissipated in the air, or, sometimes, trap herself under a blanket to better contain the smell, but now, well, this was air, wasn't it? Korra smirked naughtily, Meelo could do it, so why couldn't she? "only one way to find out." she thought to herself. She could barely keep her hands from shaking as she performed her air bending technique on the tainted air around her groin. She focused it into a sphere, the slight warmth emanating from it the only confirmation that she had in fact airbent her fart.

She swirled her hands delicately around the globe and brought it closer and closer to her head, until she engulfed herself with it. The sour, intoxicating stench instantly flooded her nostrils as she took a long, deep breath, it was even better then she expected, the fumes were highly dense as a result of her airbending which made it much more potent.

"Wow, oh, Wooow! That is soo good!" She exclaimed in excitement, she was so enraptured, she almost forgot that she had more. That first fart had taken quite a bit of effort to force out, but now the floodgate were open. She kept one hand swirling around her head, holding the ball of noxious gas together, and put the other one near her asshole in preparation.

Within seconds she followed up the first performance with three others of even greater intensity. The first was deep, loud and long, that ended with a dramatic rip like the closing of a zipper. The second was a wet and flapping burst, which stretched out and lingered, and the third... The third was low and hot, almost burning and practically silent, her favorite. As she was expelling it, Korra was bending the stream of foul wind up to her head incorporating it into the sphere. The odor grew more and more intense by the second, it was so thick that Korra could see a faint but clearly visible green tint to the air around her. With each whiff she could pick up the various vegetables, the carrots, the potatoes, the broccoli...

As she sat there, steeped in her own reek, her breathing began to get slower and deeper, and she felt a wetness building up in her nether regions, she chuckled to herself in delight, reaching down with her free hand to attend to her needs... It was good to be back. Each sniff of gas and motion of her hand brought her closer and closer to paradise, she was quaking now, "It smells s-so amazing! I c-can't ta- take- ah!" she muttered to herself. As she slipped deeper and deeper, not even for a moment did her airbending falter, on the contrary, her motions of swirling around her head grew progressively quicker and more precise, making the sphere smaller and even denser around her head, increasing the intensity of the stench and the green discoloration to a greater degree.

Korra left the real world behind in the lovely fetid green fog...

Korra plunged into herself for the final time and took a huge shuddering breath, filling her lungs to bursting, and the combination of the two was enough to throw her over the edge. She cried out loud and her spine arched back as she convulsed on the bed, completely overwhelmed by the heights she had reached! She finally, finally, lost control of her bending as her hand spasmed, the sphere collapsed and her collected aroma began to spread across the room as she fell back onto the bed still shaking and shuddering. As she began trying to recollect herself and she realized she still had more fuel, much more... But shock flashed across her face when she realized she'd just let out a rather... immodest scream. Now, the average ignorant listener would almost certainly interpret it as a cry of pain, however that would hardly save her, as she feared that it would draw someone else back to the room to investigate.

She was as far removed from the party downstairs as she could be, and the rest of the guests were surely distracted, but just how distracted were they? She had no way of knowing whether or not they heard her, the only thing she could do was to lie and listen, helplessly, to see if any footsteps came down the temple corridors...

The question is, did anyone hear? And if so, who would it be that came down?

At 5 am, my alarm clock buzzed noisily in my ear, waking me out of a fairly deep sleep almost immediately. I reached over to it and mashed the "off" button as soon as I could. Then I reluctantly dragged myself out of bed, eyes half-open. I would have loved to get a little more sleep, but at the moment, I couldn't. Today was my first day of work at the Health & Wellness Drug Store downtown, and I wanted to make sure I was there on-time to unload the shipment coming in at 6:30.

They don't pay me much, but any bit of money I can get helps pay the rent for the studio apartment my sister and I currently live in. We're both full-time college students, so we only have time to work part-time. Nevertheless, I think it's great for me to have a job at Health & Wellness since I am majoring in pharmaceuticals. Once I get my degree, I'll already be working where I want to be, even if I am just a minimum wage stock worker at the moment.

After stretching myself to an upright stand and yawning as animatedly as possible, I peered over at my sister, who, surprisingly, was still soundly asleep, in spite of my loud alarm clock. She looked very comfortable too, and I could totally understand why. She didn't have to be up at 5 in the morning!

Nonetheless, I decided to be a troll just for the heck of it and ruin her comfort. I waltzed over to her bed on the opposite side of the room, pointed my large, panty-clad butt in her face, and ripped the longest, loudest morning fart I could rip! I covered my mouth in order to stifle my hysteric giggling, but to no avail.

"Ugh... you're disgusting." she moaned weakly in a half-sleep drawl. She then turned over and covered her head wholly with her blanket. All the while, I giggled very childishly. However, I wasn't totally done being a troll yet. A few seconds later, I felt more gas building, so I lowered my rear end closer to her head and ripped another loud (but slightly shorter) morning fart. This resulted in me cracking up laughing! My sister immediately popped up from under her blanket and forcefully pushed my butt away from her face, saying "Get your big, stinking ass away from me!"

I laughed heartily at this. As I poked my butt out and looked down at it, I had to agree with her. My butt was quite big and round and was definitely "stinking"! It wasn't uncommon at all for me to run my sister out of our apartment with my farts. Admittedly, they can be awfully rank at times, not to mention frequent! Sometimes, it'd get to a point where I'd do it so much that the smell just lingers in here for the entire day, and that would be the only thing we could smell! I continued to eye my large backside with much pride, as I was not ashamed of my gassy nature at all.

My sister (Mya's her name by the way) was always the dainty one. She's the type of girl who pretends she doesn't burp or fart, even though I know all too well that she does, sometimes quite often (though never as often as me!). Most times, she tries to hide it by letting it slip out silently or doing it in the bathroom where I can't hear, but almost every night, I get to witness her let it all out in her sleep big time. I think it's hilarious! The smell of her farts has never bothered me much, but I think the smell of my own has sort of desensitized me. In spite of her daintiness, however, Mya is always pretty tolerant of my flatulent antics. Don't let her most recent reaction mislead you! She was just annoyed that I disturbed her sleep.

I walked into the bathroom and locked the door behind me. I then proceeded to unclothe myself of the tank top and the pair of panties I slept in then began my shower routine. While in the tub, I took the liberty of pushing out several loud farts that sounded humorously wet and reeked heavily of the cheeseburger I ate last night. The strengthened stench of my gas in the shower always makes me chuckle.

My fascination with farting and burping in general leads to a lot of people labeling me as "unladylike" or even "manly", and to an extent, they're kind of right. I've always been a tomboy, even as a kid. I bonded more with my big brothers than I did with Mya, whose only a year older than me. It's not that we don't get along really well. I've just never really been in to girly things and acting girly. Even if I wasn't so proud to be gassy, I'd probably still be labeled as manly. I'm like 6'2" and almost as muscular as the average man. I might as well embrace my ways as much as I can, including how frequently I fart. Everything seems to give me gas anyway, so there's no sense in me trying to hide it like my sister and make myself uncomfortable.

Once I was finished my shower routine, I walked out of the steamy bathroom clothed in nothing but my bathrobe. Then I began dressing myself in my Health & Wellness uniform, which today, consisted of a pale blue t-shirt, black leggings, and a pair of blue sneakers. Once fully clothed, I returned to the bathroom and began primping myself in the mirror to the best of my ability. Even as tomboyish as I am, I still have feminine habits!

And in spite of my height and muscle tone, I still had an undeniably feminine appearance. I gazed at my deep, hourglass figure in the mirror with confidence. Then I pushed back my dark, wavy, shoulder-length hair to free my bronze-skinned face and its nearly flawless complexion. I always thought of myself as very attractive, but Mya's general success with guys in comparison to mine has always persuaded me to think otherwise. She's not nearly as muscular as me and is a couple inches shorter. Guys probably feel intimidated by me. Mya also wears makeup kind of often, and that's something I almost never do!

I then shrugged at my idle thoughts and proceeded to walk out of the bathroom, but before I did, I poked my legging-covered butt in the air to where I could see it in the mirror then I ripped a hard, wet-sounding fart!

"Ooh yeah! That was a nice, bubbly one!" I boasted as I fanned my rear with my hand proudly. "Yeah, that's probably the problem." I added as I began to laugh. "Oh well!"

14222222222222222222222221.content:
Beth, Cassie, Lucy, Rose, and Mark were driving back home after a meal at a Mexican restaurant. Mark was driving, Rose was in the passenger seat, and Beth, Lucy, and Cassie were in the back. Brendan was also in the back seat with them.

Rose was their mother, plump and a tad short with a chubby face with short black hair that was combed neatly in an almost bowl-shape and wearing a cream-colored shirt under her black suspenders that hugged her big round ass. She also had her nails polished dark-blue.

Mark was the largest of them all, had brown hair that went to the tip of his neck, a goatee, a blue-purple shirt, a turquoise cap, and white jeans that covered his huge butt.

Beth had a plump elongated head with really long black hair that often hung over part of her face and her large chest, which was barely held in by her pink tank top, due to the fact that it had the job of shrouding her big gut. A short silk skirt was veiled over her fat butt.

Cassie was Beth's twin sister, and she also had a large chest and belly, which was covered with a purple tank top. Her black hair was a lot shorter, only going down a little past her neck, and blue jean shorts were held up by a belt over her large butt. She packed more weight than her sister, with her tank top straps squeezing her plump shoulders and her stomach rolls really stretching the shirts fabric.

Lucy was the younger sister, and unlike the rest of her family, she had an average build. She had short brown hair and wore a white shirt, a blue skirt, and a yellow headband.

Brendan was Beth's boyfriend and the odd-one-out. He was also of average build, had blonde hair that went down to the bottom of his neck and combed outwards with long bangs, and wore blue jeans, a dark-blue shirt, and a blue and white checkered coat.

"Dad, I STILL don't think this is safe for Brendan." Beth said.

"Sorry sweetie, but this is all we have room for. It took forever to make this car because the materials needed to withstand our abilities were very expensive. Remember what the days were like before we had this?" Mark said.

"Yeah, we would have to hold it all in the entire time." Cassie said with a huff.

"But wherever we DID stop at really suffered the consequences!" Lucy said, snickering.

"Yeah, but that has nothing to do with Brendan!" Beth exclaimed.

Brendan was squished between Beth and Cassie, and had really no wiggle room. "I'm fine, Beth, r-really." he said, but it was obvious that he wasn't comfortable.

"He's right, sis. Squeezed between you and me, he's already got his airbags deployed!" Cassie joked while also trying to prove a point.

"Well...I guess thats true..." Beth muttered. Brendan may be SAFE, but he wasn't exactly riding smoothly. Unfortunately for him, there wasn't much that could be done about that.

"Well, Beth, why doesn't Cassie just switch spots with me? If I'm in the middle, your boyfriend isn't being smothered!" Lucy suggested.

"Because I'm the largest of us three. Beth's belly weight is pretty much neatly packed in her gut, but mine is spread throughout my middle, and I'm a little taller than her. Since I take up the most room, I need the middle spot." Cassie explained with her hands on her stomach, almost sounding like she was bragging.

"And Lucy, if you were sitting by him, you would gas him out." Beth added.

"What?!" Lucy exclaimed.

"Anyone next to you who isn't resistant to your gas pretty much gets gassed to death, which usually includes everyone else in the vicinity."

"Why else do you think our parents and the school arranged for at least one of us to be in each of your classes?" Cassie added.

Lucy grinned hugely in remembering this.

BBBBBBBBBBRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGBBBBBB!

A low rumbling sound echoed throughout the vehicle. Cassie's butt, as well as the entire back seat, also rumbled, and the slight smile on her face was a dead giveaway on who 'dealt it'.

Brendan groaned a little since the poor guy was smothered between the two stocky sisters and felt, as well as smelled, the whole thing.

"Not bad, sweetie, but if you're going to create an earthquake, I'd make it higher on the richter scale." Mark said with a little smile.

"Dad, you aren't going to-?" Beth herself wasn't worried about the strength of the farts from her family, but she was worried for Brendan's sake, since he was always the one to suffer the consequences.

"What do you mean, dad? Can you show me?" Cassie asked, pretending to sound confused, which everyone else could clearly

"Sure thing!" he replied, and lifted his large right butt cheek off the seat.

BBBBBBBBLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOVVVVVVVVVVVVVVBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRVVVVVVVOOOOOOOOO OOOOOOOOOOOBBBBBBBBBBBTTTTTT!!!!

Her father's fart sounded more like a spaceship taking off than an earthquake. The car shook violently and the windows and frame rattled as if it was going to fall apart in any minute! Time and time again, however, it was able to withstand the Blaster's blasts.

The car was filled with the smell of his emission, which was so volumous and potent that it thickened the air a little. Brendan whimpered a little and blinked a few times from this, so Beth put her arm tightly around him and he had no choice but to place his nose into her fat. Normally, she would hug him tightly, causing his face to be buried in somewhere more...personal, but there wasn't exactly a lot of leg room. Brendan always felt emasculated doing this, but in desperate situations, you have to do whatever it takes to survive. Besides, the Blaster family, as well as his group of housemates, had already blown away what little dignity the poor guy had left.

"Sorry about that one, Brendan! I really need to know my own strength!" Mark said with a chuckle.

"That was an awesome demonstration either way, dad." Cassie said, grinning.

"Should we pay a visit to the Guster family?" Rose asked the others.

Brendan could be heard moaning something, but it was muffled and unintelligible.

"I think thats a 'no'." Cassie said with a smirk.

The Guster family, who were the Blaster's neighbors, were nice folks, but Brendan just couldn't handle the two families combination of chemical weapons. Cortney and Sadie, the two daughters, and Lucas, the brother, would often have you-know-what contests with the Blaster siblings. John and Jules, the parents, weren't exactly above emissions either.

Cortney was quite big and had an even bigger butt that stuck out a few inches, her brown hair was tied in a bun, she wore glasses, grey sweatpants, and a T-shirt that said 'Fart Now Loading' in green on the back with a progress bar on it that was almost full.

Sadie was large as well with a bulging gut like Beth, brown hair that went a little past her shoulders, a green shirt, a dark-blue coat, and black pants with the fabric stretched to the limit from her large butt and thunder thighs.

Lucas had black hair that was styled a lot like Brendan's, was tall and thin, and wore a yellow-orange shirt and black jeans.

Jules was a large woman with a very big round butt, curly blonde hair, white yoga pants, a blue shirt, and a light-blue Hawaiian jacket.

John was the largest of them all, even bigger than Mark, had short black hair, a red plaid shirt, and brown jeans.

"What if we drop you kids off at Brendan's place to hang out?" Mark asked.

Brendan also didn't like this idea, well, not as much as he didn't like the first suggestion at least. It doesn't make much sense why he would detest going to the place where he lives. It was very spacious, it was in a good location, and he liked all of his housemates. That last part WAS the problem, because his housemates were just as flatulent as the Blasters and the Gusters. There was Edward, Corey, Marcus, Nate, Mathew, Brad, Dobbs, Trevor, and Todd. Nine people in total is quite the crowd, but with splitting the rent 10 ways, they could actually afford to stay at what is a large glorified frathouse anyway.

Edward was tall and had dark-blonde hair that was spiked up, a green jacket with long cream-colored sleeves, a grey shirt, and blue jeans.

Corey had light-brown hair in a bowl-cut that had long bangs and was combed outward slightly in the back that went down to the top of his neck, a brown t-shirt, and grey-blue jeans.

Marcus was a Latino who had black hair that was somewhat spiked up, a grey t-shirt with red borders on the neck and arms, and blue jeans.

Nate was a Latino who had short black hair, a dark-grey and light-blue striped t-shirt, black-grey jeans, and a black wool hat.

Mathew was slightly chubby with short dark-brown hair, a leaf-green shirt, and camo pants.

Brad was very tall and very fat with dark-brown curly hair, sunglasses, a grey shirt, a blue coat, and black jeans.

Dobbs was somewhat short and very fat with a bulging gut, long brown hair that went down a bit past his neck that hung over his wide shoulders, a goatee, a red plaid coat, a white shirt, and grey jeans held up by a brown belt.

Trevor was the largest of the group, a very round guy that was even a little wider than Mark was, had brown hair that we combed upwards at the front and slightly curly in the back, a light-blue buttoned up shirt, and very dark-blue stretch pants that somehow managed to hold in his blubbery build.

Todd was another somewhat-tall obese guy with brown hair that was combed to the sides that went down to a little past the bottom of his plump face, a dark-blue shirt, camo shorts, and glasses.


Where do they decide to go?
14222222222222222222222221.title: Yes.

142222222222222222222222212.content:
Still, Brendan liked all of his housemates, and he realized that Cassie and Lucy had never actually met them, so he decided to go with that.

"Yeah, that would be great." Brendan said.

"Cool, I never met your friends before!" Lucy said.

"Neither have I, so this'll be pretty fun." Cassie said.

"Then its settled." Mark said and proceeded to Brendan's place.

After a few moments, Beth's eyes widened a little from being hit by a sudden smell. When a member of the family smelt it, they could always tell who dealt it, so Beth knew who the culprit was.

"Mom!" Beth exclaimed.

"Sorry sweetie, it just slipped out!" Rose said with a grin.

"Rose, when you grin and lift your big left butt cheek off the seat, I don't say that it 'just slipped out'." Mark said with a chuckle.

"Okay, you got me, but that one wasn't even any good."

"I know, but I thought we all agreed not to pass gas on purpose in the car with Brendan!" Beth exclaimed.

"Well, obviously, we must not have, considering our emissions." Cassie replied.

"Don't...worry about it, Beth." Brendan said.

"Well I AM worried about it, Brendan." she replied.

"I'M more worried about mom." Lucy said.

"Whats that, dear?" Rose said, hearing herself being mentioned.

"I think you're losing your flatulent skills. That one was probably the best one you can do." Lucy said with a smirk, telling a bold-faced lie so her mother would retaliate.

"You think so, huh?" Rose said with a smirk, knowing exactly what her daughter was doing.

"Lucy, shut up!" Beth said, shooting her a glare.

"I kind of agree with Lucy, you're past your prime." Cassie said to her mother.

"Oh girls, your mother is going to show you that is far from the case." Rose said and leaned as far to the right as her large body could in the cramped front seat, elevating her large left butt cheek into the air.

"Just remember, you girls asked for this." Mark said, nodding slowly. And with a little grin, his wife broke wind.

She literally broke wind.

As in a visible gust of wind blew out from her butt, and even sounded like a strong breeze blowing. The hair of her daughters and Brendan waved around wildly, and Brendan scrunched up his nose and shut his eyes to protect himself, but it did little good from Roses' gale force wind.

The vehicle itself creaked and shook from the smell and the power from the womans passed gust, and had she been anywhere less...reinforced, it most certainly would've caused collateral damage.

"Ahhhhhh!" Rose sighed happily from her emission and fanned the fart fumes from her butt towards her daughters in a gesture of motherly love, then sat back down.

"Nice one mom!" Lucy said with a grin.

"Yeah, that was really huge. You proved us wrong!" Cassie said.

"...Yeah, good one..." Beth admitted, cringing a little for her boyfriend's sake, who was trying to protect himself with his nose buried in her belly, but it wasn't helping a whole lot.

"Maybe its YOU GIRLS who are losing your gas then!" Rose said with a grin, trying to initiate a mother-daughter fart contest.

"Are you wanting to have a fart contest against us?!" Lucy exclaimed, her eyes lighting up with excitement.

"I love it when we do that! I'm in!" Cassie said eagerly.

"What?! No!" Beth was understandably against it out of Brendan's safety, since the Blaster family fart-offs can reach pretty much toxic levels of stench (and damage). The fact they were in such a cramped space would only make things worse for her poor boyfriend.

"Then it'll just be me and Lucy against her then." Cassie said with a slight scowl.
142222222222222222222222212.title: Visit Brendan's Housemates

1422222222222222222222222122.content:
"Sorry to rain on your parade, ladies, but we're here already." Mark said, stopping the car in front of a large two-story brick house.

Brendan breathed a sigh of relief, he really dodged a bullet there!

"You kids have a good time. We'll be back to pick you up later on tonight." Rose said as the girls and Brendan got out, the male taking deep breaths of clean air.

They walked up the sidewalk, Brendan unlocked the front door, and they went inside.

The house had dark-blue carpet and a small corridor led to the living room, where there were many grey-blue leather couches and yellow beanbags, all in front of a giant flat-screen TV built into the wall.

To the side of the room was the yellow-tiled kitchen with 3 wooden tables that had 4 metal seats each. The countertops, cupboards, and appliances bordered the area adjacent to the tables.

Back in the living room were wooden stairs tucked in the corner that were enclosed in their own hallway that led upstairs where three large rooms, two with three beds and one with four, and two bathrooms.

Upon entering, Brendan, Beth, Cassie, and Lucy were greeted by Edward and Brad.

"Brendan! Welcome back!" Edward said and placed his arm on Brendan's shoulder, using him like an armrest like he usually did.

"Hey Brendan." Corey said, walking up to him with his hands in his pockets.

"You didn't tell us you were bringing GUESTS..." Brad said in a low tone and a huge frown.

"Uhh..." Cassie and Lucy looked a little uneasy, but Beth and Brendan shown no reaction.

"Heh, I'm just messing around with you. I'm fine with you guys coming here." Brad said, losing his frown and nodding.

"Yeah, Brad is super easygoing and pretty much a gentle giant, he's not going to really care about you girls coming over without warning." Brendan said.

"You guys should come in so we can get introduced." Corey said.

They all did so and proceeded to the living room, which was where the rest of Brendan's housemates just happened to be.

Todd and Dobbs were sitting on one of the couches, as were Marcus, Mathew, and Nate. Trevor was on one of the beanbags, and another empty beanbag was where Brad had been. There were three other empty beanbags, an empty couch, and an empty three-person sofa.

"Wow thats a lot of seats." Cassie said.

"Yeah, well when you have 10 people under one roof, plus guests, you need a lot of space." Brendan said.

"Especially if there are also PEOPLE who need a lot of space, like myself." Brad said with a slight smirk, placing his hands on his stomach.

"Hmm." Cassie had a slight smirk as well. Looks like she wasn't the only one who bragged about their build.

"Brendan! You're back! And we finally get to meet all the sisters!" Trevor exclaimed.

"Yep. You guys know Beth, and Lucy and Cassie are her sisters." Brendan said, gesturing to each girl. "Anyway, I can give you girls some more info about my housemates if you want."

"Yes!" Lucy exclaimed.

"Well have a seat first, you guys." Dobbs said.

Lucy and Corey sat at the empty couch, Cassie sat at one of the beanbags, and Brendan sat at the middle of the sofa with Beth and Edward on either side of him, the latter still using him as an armrest.

"So who are all these guys?!" Lucy exclaimed, eager to hear about them.
1422222222222222222222222122.title: They arrive at Brendan's place.

14222222222222222222222221221.content:
"Well like I said before, Brad is an easygoing giant, and like you just saw, he likes to brag about his...mass and ass and gas, as well as pranking people with it, and likes joking about how funny and strong his gas is...except its not really joking because its all true." Brendan explained.

"He's right about that. Passing gas is funny, especially around other people." Brad said, sitting back on the beanbag he had gotten up from.

"Oh we all can relate to THAT." Cassie said.

"This guy using me as an armrest is my best friend Edward." Brendan said.

"Thanks Brendan." Edward said with a big smile.

"...Whoa, this is pretty sudden, but I really gotta say Edward has a real nice smile." Lucy said.

"Yep, Edward really needs his smile trademarked. It could melt the heart of any woman...as well as her nose. Almost every time, whenever Edward smiles, he smells too. As in, he releases a silent but deadly fart that is usally proportionate to how happy he looks, and he has a BLAST whenever he is around me, if you know what I mean." Brendan explained, cringing a little since Edward did just that.

"That is real funny and ingenious! Lure people over with your charm and then gas them out!" Lucy exclaimed.

"Yep, this prettyboy is also pretty touchy-feely, which you could probably guess considering how he is using me as an armrest. I think its partly because he likes being tall, which helps him with sports and athletics."

"So he drives women away and puts his arms around a guy..." Cassie said to herself.

"Do NOT judge me that way. You'll get major payback from me if you do." Edward said sternly, pointing at the large girl and, for a very rare moment, glaring and frowning.

"Sorry Edward, you're right, that was judgmental and unfair of me." Cassie said, hanging her head a little.

"So what about this bowl-cut brunette by me?" Lucy asked.

"Thats Corey, my second best friend. He likes mingling around other people just to randomly scatter them with a loud fart, and 'scattering' can either mean them running away or being blown away. He's kind of like Brad in away, since he loves to boast about his blasts, except he does it like some kind of announcer, probably because he loves watching movies. He used to call himself the fartriloquist, but that wasn't giving himself enough credit." Brendan explained.

"Whats a fartriloquist?" Beth asked.

"Someone who can fart, but make it seem like someone else did it. It was funny, but it didn't feel as meaningful or strong, since if I blasted it big, it would be obvious who the real culprit is." Corey explained, "So I owe up to my gas and people will know Corey is a talented guy with a great and dangerous power!" he continued in a proud and booming voice, spreading out his arms dramatically.

"See what I mean?" Brendan said, smiling and shaking his head a little.

"I agree. If you can't owe up to it, don't let it out." Cassie said.

"Pride and shamelessness is the key with talent!" Corey said in the same announcer-like voice.

"Speaking of pride, that big dude with the glasses and camo shorts is Todd. He's very proud of his blasts and will demonstrate on anyone who doubts it. Not to say he doesn't have a...blast blasting, but he ain't humble about it, thats for sure! He is more humble when playing tabletop games and video games, though." Brendan explained.

"Ya got that right, Brendan!" Todd replied with a confident smirk and crossing his arms.

Lucy purposely wanted to get him to show his stuff. "Oh I bet he is just all-!" she was cut off by Beth loudly clearing her throat and shooting her a glare.

"The other big dude with the goatee is Dobbs, and Todds best friend and into games just like HE is. He'll actually find strangers to play against, because they'll usually make some sort of remark about his looks or his weight...which is exactly why he finds them. He ain't self-conscious about it at all, and just like my other weighty housemates, is proud of it. When someone comments on him, he'll just let 'er rip with his coat waving in the breeze! They'll know he has no body issues after THAT!" Brendan explained.

"What about us three?" Nate asked.

"Okay, the guy with the wool hat is Nate, who is the bro of Marcus, the guy next to him. Nate likes his head accessory, and he can get peeved if you badmouth him about it. He really likes music and can play quite a few instruments pretty well. His favorite thing, though, is pranking people with his farts, especially me. For awhile I've had to lock the door to my room because I would often wake up to grey-black jeans, if you know what I mean. He has eased up on that...kind of, since Brad and Todd taught him and Marcus a lesson."

"Wait, what does Marcus have to do with it?" Cassie asked.

"Marcus, again, is his brother. And, again, he also loves to prank people with his farts. And, again again, I would also wake up to his jeans. I'm surprised he and Nate never really fight, since siblings often do that, I guess. Its like they are best friends just goofing about. Marcus likes going to department stores, recording videos with his phone...usually of said pranks, and eating fast-food...which usually is "fuel" for said pranks."

"You're right about US, dude!" Marcus said, flashing Brendan a grin.

"The other guy there is Mathew. He knows quite a bit about computers, and likes making sound effects and levels for video games. He also likes shamelessly farting wherever he is and laughing about it, which is why he gets along with Marcus and Nate real well." Brendan explained.

"Yup! I'll let 'em off anywhere and accept full responsibility for 'em!" Mathew added with a grin, which lit up his large dimples.

"Last BUT not least is the biggest guy, Trevor. Like Edward he is very...personal, and if you get caught in his...gravity, well, he is like Jupiter, if you know what I mean...He's really smart and a computer whiz, just like Mathew, and despite his looks, he has no trouble getting about or anything like that. He doesn't get upset really about much, and not even ridicule bothers him, since he's just like Dobbs in that sense, if you know what I mean."

"You sure say 'if you know what I mean' a lot today, Brendan." Beth said to him, not that she really minded.

"The guy is trying to be clever with fart and fat jokes, its kinda funny, you gotta admit." Brad said.

"Yeah, I kinda liked them." Cassie stated.

"Everyone has been introduced, so what should we do now?" Dobbs asked.

"Fart contest?" Lucy suggested, which made Brendan wince a little.

"Yeah, we never got to have the one before, and this one should be a TON better!" Cassie said with a sly smile.

"Marcus and I LOVE having those! We've got a lot of practice under our belts!" Nate boasted.

"Any chance I get to show off I'll take!" Todd said.

"Yeah, it'll be really funny." Brad said.

"I'm ready to drop some big ones!" Mathew exclaimed.

"I am all for it!" Corey exclaimed.

"Me too." Edward added.

"Oh yeah! I'm ready for this!" Dobbs exclaimed.

"Hehheh, this should be great." Trevor said.
14222222222222222222222221221.title: Brendan introduces his housemates.

142222222222222222222222212212.content:
"N-no! No way!" Beth objected.

"Aww, really?" Trevor said, sighing in disappointment.

"Oops, forgot how uptight my sister is..." Lucy grumbled.

"I am NOT uptight, Lucy!" Beth exclaimed.

"Sure you are, at least when Brendan is with you. You're so reluctant to let loose that it almost makes it seem like your ASHAMED of your gas." Cassie said.

"That is NOT true! And the only reason I hold back is for his protection!"

"Protection? Are you kidding me? Beth, he lives with 9 gassy guys, he doesn't NEED protection from farts! Hell, its probably the main form of air that he BREATHES around here!"

"She's...pretty much right, Beth. I'm used to it, even if it DOES affect me pretty bad. Of course, that don't mean I'd love to be in the middle of a massive fart contest, but I can certainly deal." Brendan said to her.

"So just let 'er rip!" Todd said with a big grin.

"...Alright then. But that doesn't mean I want Brendan to be gassed out!" Beth stated.

"So thats still a 'no' on the contest?" Edward asked, darting his eyes around and putting a hand over his chin.

"Well..."
142222222222222222222222212212.title: Beth objects the contest.

choices: Brendan is hesitant about the contest.
1422222222222222222222222122122.content:
There was a knock on the door.

"I've got it." Brendan said, got up, and opened the door. His eyes opened wide and he nearly jumped backward in shock upon seeing Lucas, Cortney, and Sadie.

"Yo Brendan." Lucas greeted.

"What-what are you guys doing here?"

"You don't remember? Lucy said the first time she and Cassie came over here to meet your housemates, we could as well! You gave her permission for that!" Cortney said.

"When-when was this?"

"A couple of weeks ago, why? Didn't Lucy tell you she sent us a text message about it?" Sadie asked.

"No. Not at all." Brendan said in a slightly lower tone.

"Oh yes, the Gusters are here!" Lucy exclaimed as she and her sisters walked to the doorway.

"Lucy, you didn't tell me they were coming."

"Oh...I didn't? Sorry about that, Brendan! I got so caught up in meeting your housemates that I forgot to..." Lucy said bashfully.

"If we're barging in, we can turn around and leave. Its fine with all of us." Cortney said.

Brendan, again, liked the Guster family and he didn't want to come off as a jerk by turning them down, even if with the Blaster sisters combined with his 9 housemates would make things very cramped.

"No! Not at all! Come on inside!" Brendan said with a little hesitation.

The Gusters did so, and everyone went back to the living room at their same seating. Cortney and Sadie sat on the two remaining beanbags, and Lucas had no choice but to sit on the floor next to the couch where Nate, Mathew, and Marcus were on.

"Sorry Lucas, but even with all these spots, we STILL ran out." Brendan said.

"No worries at all, I'm fine where I am. Stuff like this just happens." Lucas said.

"So who are all these guys?" Cortney asked.

"I actually know a couple of them. Nate, Marcus, and Mathew mostly; we've gone pranking a couple of times."

"I remember doing that!" Nate said.

"Yup, but that was awhile ago." Mathew said.

"Well the rest of us never met ya before." Edward said.

"I'm Lucas. I love drumming and skateboarding, as well as just laying around and broing out with dudes while passing lots and lots of toxic gasses." Lucas said.

"I'm Sadie. I make it my mission to make sure people are comfortable and proud of their bodies, including their bodily emissions! I love surfing the web and demonstrating my total shamelessness!" Sadie said.

"I'm Cortney. I don't know if you guys saw my shirt, but its just a nice warning I give people who are standing behind me! It really don't help them though, cuz I'll end up blowing them away with a 75 mph gust of wind from my C4-equivalent big butt! I love shopping, and trust me, I don't have to worry about waiting in the checkout lines, thats for sure!" Cortney said.

Brendan took a deep breath (something he was rarely able to do, due to the "aroma" he was often surrounded by), and introduced his 9 housemates one by one again.

"...Fart contest?" Lucy suggested again.

"Oh yeah! Sadie and I ain't got any shame!" Cortney exclaimed happily.

"Its what we always do, and this ones gonna be a big one...and I'm not talkin' about the contest, ya know." Lucas said.

"Yeah, I mean, um, its, uhh, something to, well, do, right?" Brendan said uneasily, fumbling through his words and trying to let the others know he was alright with it, even if he was dreading it.

"So you're giving us the OK, Brendan?" Todd asked.
1422222222222222222222222122122.title: Someone is at the door.

choices: Poor Brendan has no choice but to be the judge right then and there.
14222222222222222222222221221222.content:
"Umm...I wouldn't say I am, uhh, really saying THAT, but its just..." Brendan was still on the fence about this.

"Come on, Brendan!" Edward said with a hopeful smile. He started to repeatedly poke, prod, and shake his best friend, grinning. "Coem on! Come on, Brendan! Brendan, come on! Come on! Come ON!" Edward ended up accidentally shoving Brendan off the couch.

"Wow." was all Cassie said.

"Oh, sorry Brendan."

Brendan got up and sat back down. "Well, uhh, if thats what everybody...wants, then I-I guess we could-"

Lucy gave him no time to finish and quickly jumped to her feet. "I'm gonna go first!" she said quickly, ran over to Brendan, and stuck her butt out a little toward him.

"Lucy, what are you doing?!" Beth exclaimed.

"Brendan's going to be the judge, right? Well the judge has to experience the entries first-hand so he can give a proper score!"

"She ain't wrong about that!" Cortney added.

Brendan did NOT want to be nominated for that position. "I-I never said I was going to be the jud-!"

PPPPLLLLLLLVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVRRRRTTTTTTTTT!!!

The brunette gave him no time to finish and ripped a loud fart right at him. The force of the fart made her skirt flutter and Brendan's hair blow back a little.

Both Brendan and Lucy groaned at this; the former from being farted upon, and the latter for being unimpressed with said fart. "Aww, that was weak! I can do much better than THAT!"

Before Lucy could butt-blast Brendan better, he spoke up. "Lucy, WAIT!...Okay, if we all HAVE to do this, can we PLEASE go somewhere more...open? I don't want this place stinking up more than it has to, and I don't think I can handle all of this in such a small room!" poor Brendan begged.
14222222222222222222222221221222.title: Brendan is hesitant about the contest.

choices: They all arrive at the mall.
142222222222222222222222212212221.content:
"Hmm, you make a great point, Brendan." Edward said, putting a finger on his chin in a thoughtful state.

"We would probably end up killing him in here anyway!" Mathew said with a giggle.

"Where could we go?" Beth asked.

"What about the mall?" Cortney suggested.

"Yeah, thats an AWESOME idea!" Marcus exclaimed.

"Then we wouldn't just need Brendan; other people would judge us based on their reactions!" Dobbs added.

"Phew! Then its settled! Lets go; its within walking distance from here, thankfully." Brendan said, wiping his brow from dodging a bullet yet again.
142222222222222222222222212212221.title: Brendan's negotiation is successful.

1422222222222222222222222122122211.content:
They arrived at the entrance of the mall and Cortney stepped forward.

"I wanna go in ahead of y'all if thats alright." she said with a big smile.

"Why?" Corey asked.

"You'll see."

The rest of the gang followed Cortney inside, and a few patrons could be seen looking at the large girl in shock.

"Watch THIS." she whispered to the others. Cortney turned around and cleared her throat loudly, catching the attention of the people in the main lobby.

Gasps and yelps were heard and people started to quickly walk away discretely or just running for the hills.

An employee managed to scramble to a mic and and announce, "Attention all patrons! RUN TO THE NEAREST EXIT! Its a level C-sighting at the entryway!"

This increased the panic in the mall as many more people were doing just that. All the while, Cortney looked around at the hysterics around her with a huge smile of accomplishment on her chubby face. Most of the patrons and employees have evacuated, although a good number of people still stayed "behind".

"...Whoa, what was THAT all about?" Edward asked, darting his eyes around.

Cortney giggled, feeling very amused and very proud. "That was ME, I'm the level-C that fellow talked about. I have a sort of reputation around this here mall, and when people see my backside, they KNOW they gotta run for it before I blow!"
1422222222222222222222222122122211.title: They all arrive at the mall.

14222222222222222222222221221222112.content:
"Thats AWESOME! I wish I had a reputation like that!" Brad said in awe.

"Don't worry, you kinda DO!" a cheery girl voice said.

A teenage couple walked up to the gang; Annabelle and Jackson.

Jackson was a guy with dark-blonde hair with long bangs that resembled Corey's, except not as much of a bowl-cut as his was, and wore a white t-shirt, a black vest, and grey jeans.

Annabelle was a girl with long, curly brown hair and also wore a white t-shirt and a black vest, as well as a black skirt.

"Those level-C warnings lead us right to you guys every single time." Jackson said.

"You're welcome." Cortney said, placing her hands on the sides of her large backside.

"Sooooo, how close to, ahem, 'completion', are you?" he asked with a slightly worried look.

"Thats part of what we're here to find out!" Lucy said excitedly.

"Yeah, you brought the whole gang here this time! That is SOOOOOO cool!" Annabelle also excitedly said.

"Kinda funny how you two know us all, even when this is the first time the rest of us have gotten together." Brendan said.

"THATS because I know your housemates from my big bro Brad, and Jackson knows them from Marcus, Nate, and Mathew! We know YOU and Lucy and her family through school, and both through HER family and Jackson knowing Lucas, we know the Guster family TOO!"

"...Just never all in the same place at once." Jackson added, calmly capping off his girlfriends energy.

"Wait, why are you guys all here together? I don't think you told us, but if you did, I don't remember what you toid us." Annabelle absent-mindedly said.

"They never actually told us, Annabelle, but I've got a pretty good feeling I know what it is." Jackson said, smiling and shaking his head at his girlfriends moment of ditziness.

"Think about it, little sister." Brad said with a smirk.

Annabelle gasped in realization, "Oh my GOSH! You guys are having a-a CONTEST?! With EVERYONE here?! Thats like all-out chemical warfare! Jackie, we SO came to the mall at the right day!" Annabelle said excitedly.

"Yeah, it should be quite the...display." her boyfriend replied with an uneasy smirk. While he found the farts of the group just as entertaining as Annabelle did, he wasn't as...resistant to them as she was, probably due to not having a smelly sibling.

"Annabelle, I've been meaning to ask you, do YOU have super-farts?!" Lucy asked, hoping for an excited 'yes!'.

Annabelle laughed at the question and answered...
14222222222222222222222221221222112.title: Cortney holds it in.

choices: Brendan stays against being a judge.
Brendan caves and decides to judge.
142222222222222222222222212212221122.content:
"No! I'm not like my big bro Brad over here! Well when I'm with Jackson over here and I feel one coming, I'll let it out proudly to prank him!" Annabelle answered.

"Yeah, Annabelle's gas isn't as bad as her brother's, but it can still be pretty potent! We will be snuggling on the couch when I'm suddenly hit in the face by this stink, and she just has an evil grin on." Jackson explained with an amused smirk, which made Annabelle laugh harder than she usually did.

"Its too bad you can't fart on command like that, Annabelle." Marcus said, pointing at her and grinning.

"I'm...pretty thankful for it." Jackson said, trying to keep a straight face. Marcus, Nate, Annabelle, Mathew, Brad, Lucy, Beth, Cassie, and Brendan laughed at this.

"Yeah Jackson, you should, uhh, count yourself lucky." Brendan jokingly said, and Beth smiled at this.

"Brendan!" Annabelle ran up to the blonde boy. "I can't believe you were going to be the only judge of this contest! Especially with so many of your friends all in one place!"

"Only?" Brendan and Jackson said in unison.

"Yeah! Thats why you came here with everyone, right?! Whats a contest without the unbiased point of view of a judge to make things fair?! And now Jackson and I can help you!" Annabelle explained, and dragged Brendan by the arm back towards Jackson.

"Annabelle, I never wanted to be the judge! I brought everyone here to a more open spot so they wouldn't smell up my home!" Brendan said.

"And Jackson and I are SO glad you did! Now we can help you with this! These kinds of things usually have 3 judges anyway."

"Why would you think I would judge this, Annabelle? I never said anything about it." Jackson told her.

"But Jacksoooooon, they NEED us for an unbiased and fair point of vieeeeew!" Annabelle whined. "And it'll be drop-dead hilarious, right?!"

"Of course it'll be drop-dead hilarious, Annabelle."

"Emphasis on the 'drop-dead' part." mumbled Brendan.

"That doesn't mean I'm about to hold up a score card for every blast though!" Jackson continued, and Annabelle and Lucy snickered at the thought of this.

"But think about it Jackson! Is judging really so far off from spectating? It can just be simple and fun!" Annabelle said.

"...Yeah, you're right Annabelle. I'm making a bigger deal of this than it actually is. I'll do it." Jackson said with a shrug, and Annabelle hugged him.

"And YOU, Brendan?!" Annabelle asked, whipping around to face him.

"I...I don't think so." he said, slowly backing away. He hit something and spun around, seeing the gargantuan Brad looming over him with a scowl.

"So you're denying my little sister this?" he said in a low tone of voice.

"Are-are you trying to pressure me, Brad? Because I know you too well for that to work." Brendan said with confidence, although he still felt a TAD intimidated.

"And besides, I don't want Brendan to be forced into something he doesn't wanna do, big bro Brad!" Annabelle added.
142222222222222222222222212212221122.title: No!

1422222222222222222222222122122211222.content:
Brendan groaned a little. For the sake of his own well-being, he was objecting to the idea of being a judge for this colossal contest. He planned on just going to another part of the mall while his friends let loose. (and hopefully not bringing the entire place to the ground in the process) However, he knew he was coming off as kind of a killjoy, and its not like this was the first contest he had to pay mind to, (although it was the first one of this magnitude...in more than one sense) and so he swallowed what little pride he had left and gave in.

"...Fine, I'll judge it." he quietly said, which made Brad and Annabelle cheer.

Brendan, Annabelle, and Jackson sat side-by-side on the mall's fountain a few feet away from the others, who were all lined up, and the contest was ready to begin!
1422222222222222222222222122122211222.title: Brendan caves and decides to judge.

14222222222222222222222221221222112222.content:

The large couple were a bit cramped in their seats. Roses' large booty was a tight fit in the chair, and Mark's very rotund frame was squeezed between the armrests. However, it wasn't bad enough to take away their enjoyment of the film.

This pressure on their bodies built up a pressure IN their bodies, and due to Mark's larger build, he was much better at holding back than his wife was. Rose was struggling a little, but its not like she felt pressured (in more than one way) to hold it all in.

The plump woman would shamelessly blast her butt in public whenever she felt one coming on, which was probably "passed" down to Cassie and Lucy. Mark was more responsible with his blasts as they packed more power than Rose's, but he could be just as bad as his wife at times when he really wanted to. Beth was the one whom he probably "passed" this on to. Despite their difference in public display, Mark didn't mind when Rose broke wind, and actually got a laugh out of it.

Rose had the choice of leaning to the right and letting it out at her husband (boring!), or leaning to the left and letting it out at the unsuspecting lady next to her. She was quite attractive with a slender frame, short blonde hair, and a long black dress. Rose got the feeling that this woman wasn't stuck-up about this, and maybe might even get a laugh out of it...provided she could remain conscious of course!

Or she could just stay considerate of others and hold it all in, which she was easily capable of doing.

choices: The woman was rather flatulent herself.

Rose grinned as she leaned away from the woman, pressing her head up against her husbands fat, who glanced over at her with a little smile since he knew exactly what she was about to do.

ffffffffffffffwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!

Rose let out a long, loud, high-pitched, squeaky fart that made the blonde woman's hair wave a little bit and the wooden armrest between them chip and peel. Despite the surprisingly loud fart, it was pretty much eclipsed by the volume of the movie.

Normally Rose would childishly giggle, sigh loudly in relief, and/or fan the fumes toward someone else as a way of "taking credit" for her emission, but she decided to skip that action this time. The woman she broke wind towards strangely had no negative reaction towards her. Why?

The person next to her was a short, young woman who wore a purple sweatshirt with dark-purple and light-purple splotches on it, dark-blue sweatpants, and had curly brown hair.

The person next to HER was a rather fat man with quite the gut and wore a red sweatshirt, brown jeans, had a blob-like head with multiple chins, and very short light-blonde hair that almost gave him the appearance of being bald.

"Kathy! Did you just fart?" the blonde woman whispered to the brunette.

"It wasn't me, Lindsay." she replied.

"Well it definitely wasn't me either! If it was me, you would've heard it loud and clear!" the man next to her said proudly.

"I know that Sam, thats why I asked Kathy and not you." Lindsay grumbled, coughing a little from the smell.

Rose didn't want to cause any more bickering, so she decided to speak up. "Sorry! That was me!" she said to them with a grin.

Lindsay glanced over at Rose, and becoming too overwhelmed by the smell at dangerously-close range, covered her nose with her shirt. She looked a little guilty doing this, like she felt as if she was offending Rose, since Lindsay didn't want to be rude.

"Whoa, nice one!" Sam said, impressed.

"Yeah!" Kathy excitedly agreed.

"Thanks, but thats not even my best one." Rose said.

"Oh! Well can you show us then?!" Kathy excitedly asked.

"Of course!" Rose proudly gripped her suspenders and elevated the right side of her large butt again.

choices: Wait, what about the OTHER contest?
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
"Please! Don't." Lindsay quickly said, holding up her hands, which made her shirt slide off her nose. There was a pause. "I'm sorry about that, but I really don't want any...demonstrations, please."

"Oh don't be sorry, I understand! Nobody wants to be hit by a sudden stink bomb from some strange chubby woman next to them in the theatre!" Rose said with a big grin.

"Lindsay gets PLENTY of that from me and Kathy!" Sam said.

"Yeah! You wanna see?!" Kathy asked, quickly turning her head to excitedly look at Lindsay and Rose.

"Oh yeah! But I don't want to stink out Lindsay here." Rose said.

"Well you already gassed out half the theatre already anyway." Sam said with a giggle. All of the rows behind Rose were emptied out, with the exception of a few unconscious victims who weren't lucky enough to escape the smell. A few people in the rows in front of her had left the theatre too.

"Yeah! We can gas out the other half too!" Kathy excitedly added.

"And then maybe the whole building while we're at it!" Sam said with a huge grin.

"Oh, hey, what about the big guy next to you? Can HE join in?"

"Oh of course I can join in, and for the record, its Mark, and thats my wife Rose." he said.

"Uhh, I'm Lindsay, and there are my friends Kathy and Sam." she said, shaking Mark's hand. She felt a little bit uneasy of all this...brewing between the four others, not to mention worried for the safety of herself and the unsuspecting remaining moviegoers.

The attractive blonde was right about the "brewing", because her young brunette friend elevated herself off her seat a little, looked down at her posterior, and had a big smile that lit up her rosy dimples.

PPPPPPPPBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLBBBBBBBBBBTTTTTTTTT!!!!

Kathy ripped a very loud, low-pitched, hard, bubbly fart that echoed throughout the theatre. The seats around her rattled, and the remaining (conscious) people in the theatre ran for the exits, since they correctly guessed that this wasn't going to be the final blast.

"Kathy." Lindsay said with an exasperated sigh. Her younger friend just giggled childishly.

"So we really are having a contest, huh?" Mark said, glad to join.

"Looks like it!" Rose replied eagerly, always up for blowing people away...in more than one sense.

"Well, thats all the convincing I need to start!" Sam said, stretching with a simultaneous satisfied sigh. With a large grin on his large face, Sam slowly leaned away from the others, trying to aim his large posterior at as many of his friends as he could, namely Lindsay, since he enjoyed pranking the exasperated blonde. Said blonde sighed once more, crossed her arms, and made an exaggerated shrug. Poor Lindsay was used to letting Sam and Kathy have fun at her own expense, but she never seen (or smelled) what Rose and Mark had in store.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
At the movie theatre, Rose, Mark, Sam, and Kathy were about to begin THEIR fart contest with Lindsay as the unfortunate "judge".

Who goes first?

Lindsay just stared at her for a moment and gave an exaggerated shrug.

Kathy jumped up from her seat and aimed her dark-blue sweatpants-covered butt a little at Lindsay.

wwwwwwrrrrrrrrrrbbbbbbbbBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPTTTTT!

Kathy bit her bottom lip and let out a very loud squeaky fart that rose in pitch into a long, loud, hard, bubbly fart. PPPRRRRRRBBBBBBBTTTTTT!!!

Who goes next?

Sam walked over to Lindsay and put an arm around her. The blonde shuddered a little, because she knew he was just trapping her, and he was a lot stronger than he looked...and that wasn't just referring to his grip!

"Well if you liked Kathy's fart, then you'll love THIS." he said.

Sam lifted his leg and leaned a little away from Lindsay, while also trying to push her body downward to his cannon, but the blonde fought against it. Then, with a huge grin on his chubby face, Sam blasted said cannon.

PPPPPPVVVVVRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBRRRRRRB BBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRBBBBBVVVPPPTTT!

Sam released a very loud, low-pitched, almost bassy fart that trailed on and on. If it wasn't for his grip on her, Lindsay almost certainly knew she would've been blown clear across the theatre!

In fact, the walls of the theatre started cracking and crumbling, and pieces of the ceiling even started falling all around them. Lindsay was sure if Sam kept this up, he would bring down the whole place, which is probably exactly what he wanted!

With a sharp finisher, Sam stopped and let go of Lindsay, who fell backwards onto the floor.

Kathy giggled, "Yeah, you almost brought down the house!"

Whose turn was next?

"Guess its my turn huh?" Rose said eagerly, gripping her suspenders.

Lindsay slowly turned around and looked over at the large woman, she still had no idea what to expect from her and Mark.

Rose turned around and bent over a little, so Lindsay started to slowly back away but bumped into Sam, who put his grip on her again.

ffwwwwwwwwwwwrrrrrsssssssshhhhhhhhfffffffffwwwwwwwwwwwrrrrrrrssssffffffwwwww wwwwrrrrrrrrrrrrfffffffffffffffsssssssssshhhhhhhhh!!

And suddenly, a visible gust of wind was unleashed from Rose's butt. Lindsay's feet were actually lifted off the ground, so it was a good thing, again, that Sam had a hold on her because he and Kathy were somehow unaffected by Rose's gale force fart.

It was as if a tornado was being whipped up from her butt as the swirling wind picked up popcorn and drinks left from the fleeing moviegoers, then burned the popcorn into nothingness, evaporated the soda, and crushed the cups into crumpled balls from the gust force and the terrible smell.

Rose's butt tornado spreaded across other isles, even ripping the seats right out of the now-rusting metal frames, which were torn up and burned away just the same. After most of the rows around her had been hit by her smelly storm, the storm "passed".

"Ahhhhhhh! Goodness!" Rose said with relief, patting her stomach. She turned around and looked at Lindsay, who was trying to fix her frazzled hair while at the same time plugging her nose. Sam and Kathy applauded her.

"Hee hee, thanks sweetie!" Rose said with a giggle.

What's next?

"So I'm the last one to blast. Sam, you might want to get a hold on Lindsay again." Mark warned. Sam did just that, and Lindsay looked a little worried at what Mark was about to let out.

The large man bent all the way over, sticking out his massive ass that pushed against the fabric of his white jeans. The moment he did so, as if it was a reflex, a bomb-like fart was released.

BBBBBBBBBWWWWWWWWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOBBBBBBBBBBBBVVVVVVVVVVVVVBBBBBBBBBPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!

Not unlike his fart in the car earlier, this one sounded more like a rocket ship taking off than anything else, only the sound was much louder. The fart was truly bomb-like, because it blasted a massive hole in the theatre, taking out the vast majority of it and exposing the parking lot. People in the vicinity were blown off their feet, and vehicles were flung in the air, but nobody was really hurt. It was hard to tell if the massive cloud caused by Mark was from all the dust kicked up by the rubble, or if it was just his fart gas.

"Heh heh heh." Mark stood up and chuckled at the huge demolition he had just caused.

Lindsay and Kathy were in shock, and Sam had a huge grin on his face.

Rose giggled at their reactions and her husband's demonstration. "Hee hee hee! My husband works as a demolitionist for construction companies across the city, and I'm sure you can tell that he is very good at his job!"

"Oh I'll say!" Sam said in agreement.

"Well we all better move on out of here before people catch wind of us, huh?" Mark said.

They all briskly walked out of the massive, well, not really 'hole', since most of the theatre was missing, it was more like they walked out what little was left of the place now. They kept walking until they reached the lot of a nearby department store.

"That was so much fun! We all have to meet up another time, right Lindsay?!" Kathy excitedly asked.

Lindsay stood there for a brief moment. Rose and Mark were nice folks, and they all certainly had a, ahem, "blast" tonight, but boy suffering through twice the number of farters she already had to? That didn't sound too pleasant for the poor woman.

However, its not like she wasn't used to the gas, and its also not like she wasn't used to putting herself through things for the sake of her friends. It could be fun hanging with this new couple!

"Yes, definitely." she said with a smile.
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Mark's turn.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
Annabelle (excitedly), Jackson (eagerly), and Brendan (reluctantly) waited for the contest to start.

Edward came up first, waved at them, sat next to Brendan (using him as an armrest, of course), glanced over at him, and smiled.

Brendan winced a little in preparation. His photogenic best friend always had noxious silent killers for farts, but he knew this time that Edward was going to put more potency into this one than usual.

tttssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssrrrwwwwwwwwwwrrrrrrrrrrrtttt!

Edward nodded a little and his smile increased in size as he let out a lethal fart that sounded like air being let out of a tire and went into a long, quiet, high-pitched, squeaky fart.

The prettyboy's emission was so potent and humid that it actually evaporated all the water in the fountain "behind" him and stopped it from flowing due to his gas causing the pipes to rust, twist, and shrivel from the sheer strength of the stench.

Brendan almost immediately fell to the ground, coughing and sobbing as he rubbed his burning and watering eyes. Had he not spent so much time around Edward, he most definitely would be knocked out cold, putting a halt on the entire contest. (Although he certainly didn't think of that as an entirely BAD thing!)

Annabelle and Jackson weren't as close to the source of the smell, but they were still harmed by it. Their tightly-shut eyes were also burning from it, and they hugged each other tightly with their faces buried in one anothers shoulders to try and protect themselves from the smell.

"Damn Edward, that smells HORRIBLE!" Jackson exclaimed.

"Yeah! You should be on riot control with that tear gas!" Annabelle exclaimed.

"Thanks you guys." Edward then looked at Brendan, who was still on his knees coughing. "I really got you with that, didn't I, Brendan?" Edward felt a little guilty for putting his best friend through that, but at the same time, he didn't want to, well, hold back in such a big contest.

"Yeah, you...ugh...really shown your stuff, Edward..." Brendan uttered, slowly getting up and sitting back on the (dried-up) fountain. The contest had JUST started and the poor guy was already NOT enjoying this at all.

Sadie took her seat between Annabelle and Brendan, the marble of the fountain cracked a little under her large weight.

"Thanks Brendan. I'm more for sitting down than standing up. Its not cause I'm fat, well, it IS cause I'm fat, but its not cause I'm lazy. Sitting down just puts more focus on my thick thighs and stomach, as well as my big fat butt for anyone who happens to see behind me." explained Sadie.

While you obviously know large women who are proud of their weight, considering who our friends are here, you have never known one of them who is willing to boast about each of her attributes for all the world to know as often as she can, right?"

I understand that people are going to find it gross, and thats not even getting into the part of me thats for this contest, but I will always stay confident!"

FFFLLLRRRBBBBBBFFFFVVVTTTTFFFRRRVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVLLLLLLLLLBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLL OOOOOOOOOOOVVVVVRRRRRRRRRRBBBBBBLLLLLLLLBBBBBBFFFFFVVVVVRTTTTT!!!!!

Sadie proudly let out a fart that started out stuttering, rippped into a very loud and long sharp fart, went into an almost baritone deep blast, and ended out sharp and bubbly.

Luckily (relatively-speaking obviously) for Brendan, this blast was more force than smell as his hair and coat waved wildly, even from his pinned-down position, in Sadie's wind. That isn't to say the smell was like a bed of roses, but it wasn't near the potency of Edward's.

The area around them shook from said force, and objects and shelves from nearby stores could be heard toppling and being thrown around. The marble on the fountain cracked and chipped, looking almost like it was going to break into a million pieces, but somehow it held together.

At last the large girl lowered her large leg, wearing a huge grin from her massive emission.

"Well thank you Brendan!" she said happily, getting up and hugging him, causing him to sink a little into her chest and belly fat.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Sadie

Up next was Mathew.

Brendan was walking along the city streets towards home one late night. Despite the kind of person he was, Brendan wasn't worried about anything bad happening. After all, he did this, like, a million times already!

All of a sudden, two young men ambushed him from an alley and backed him up against a wall.

"Empty your pockets! NOW!" one of them ordered.

"Don't try anything stupid; just do what we say and nobody has to get hurt!" the other threateningly said.

Brendan was sweating with fear. He had always been the target of bullying, which he was used to, but he had NEVER been mugged! He gulped and slowly reached into his pockets, but the muggers were getting impatient.

The first one threw him to the ground and the second took out a knife and pointed it at him.

"Enough screwing around! DO IT!" the first mugger ordered.

"O-okay! I am! I am!" Brendan, now trembling with fear, removed his wallet and cell phone from his pockets.

Brendan was walking through the hallways of his high school and holding a stack of textbooks. Looks like that whole thing was about to change.

Brendan didn't detect anything in the boy's tone like he was taunting him or something like that, but he still was not convinced this athletic-looking adolescent wasn't an asshole.

"Huh? Of course I'm not! Why in the world would I do that?" the boy said as he put a book into his locker.

"Um, well, because you're, um, a-a bully?"

"Huh? Of course I'm not! Not every older high schooler is a bully!"

"...No, but the ones who go out of their way to talk to ME are. That goes for most people here. The only thing that makes me stand out is as...well, as a target."

The boy pointed a scolding finger at Brendan. "First of all, I just happened to run into you, I came out here to put something in my locker. Second of all, just because I'm tall, good-looking, and athletic, doesn't mean I'm a bully. Third of all, the fact you are seen as only a punching bag is awful and I'm going to change that."

"What?! Really?! How?!"

The boy put on his trademarked smile and held out a hand.. "By seeing you as a friend instead! My names Edward."

"I'm Brendan!" Brendan said in bewilderment. He reached out to shake Edward's hand, but Edward patted him on the shoulder instead.

"Brendan, if anyone messes with you, you be sure to let me know, okay? I'll make sure they don't get away with that!"

"Oh, um, of-of course I will Edward!"

"Good to know." Edward said and started walking away. "I hope to see you around Brendan!"

"Me too Edward!"
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Annabelle asks about Corey.

choices: Brendan has Edward and Beth meet.
Edward and Brendan decide to go do something.
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
That afternoon, as if on cue, a bully confronted Brendan in the hallway.

"Oh no." the blonde thought, hoping Edward would show up or this bully to be LIKE Edward in the sense that he wasn't what he seemed to be.

He knocked the stack of books out of Brendan's arms and pushed him up against the lockers.

That dashed Brendan's hopes right quick.

"I haven't seen you around lately, Bren-DONE! Then again, maybe I have, I don't know, its not like you leave any impression whatsoever!" he taunted, blocking Brendan in by placing his hands on the lockers at either side of him.

"G-guess thats worked to my advantage, I guess!" the blonde said nervously, trying to stall the bully. As much of a "wimp" as he was, Brendan had developed some pretty thick skin (metaphorically of course, he was a scrawny guy after all) from all the harassment he had gone through over the years. Physical pain was not something he had gotten used to, however.

"You are SO-"

The bully's sentence was cut short when he was grabbed by the shoulder and slammed up against the lockers on the adjacent wall by none other than Edward.

He gave the bully a menacing glare, and despite his upbeat demeanor, he was truly intimidating.

"That defenseless dude you were just bullying like a jackass? Thats my friend Brendan, and if you EVER try and mess with him EVER, you will be dealing with ME, and I WILL make you wish you never even crossed-paths with EITHER of us! Got that?!"

"Y-yes I-I got it!" the bully said, trembling.

"Good to know. And spread the word to any other bastards at this school!" Edward let him go and watched with a scowl as he sprinted in the other direction.

He turned back to Brendan. "Brendan, you're alright, right?"

"Yes I am! Thanks a bunch Edward! You saved my butt there!" Brendan said gratefuly.

"I promised you I would Brendan!" he said with his smile.

"How did you even know about this anyway?"

"I was headed to my locker. This is the same place we met this morning, remember?"

Brendan looked around. "Oh I guess it is, huh? But does that mean you wouldn't have found me if that happened somewhere else?"

Edward put a finger to his lips, looking in thought. "Hmm, thats a good point Brendan...We'll have to figure out how to fix that."

Brendan sighed in defeat, he knew what he had to do about this. "...Well I shouldn't expect you to fight all my battles for me anyway Edward. You should be my friend, not my bodyguard."

Edward put his arm onto Brendan's shoulder like an armrest and flashed him a grin. "I can be both! Friends got eachothers backs!"

"Being there to my defense sometimes is one thing, but its a problem because I'm a wimp who has to learn to stand up for himself!"

"I get you Brendan, but if what you told me is true about you only being a target of bullying, then it sounds like you haven't had anyone stand by your side, or in my case, armresting by your side!"

"What does that mean Edward?"

"It means you need a close friend to encourage you and help you gain that confidence to fight back! Remember your karate stance when I met you? Yeah, so it'll take awhile, but don't worry, I'll stand, or armrest, beside you Brendan!"

Brendan relized he was getting a case of deja-vu. "Well Beth DID tell me almost the same thing..."

"So you DO have someone else close to you, and she feels the same way? Good to know!" Edward said, flashing Brendan a goofy grin.

"Well I'll trust you on that, Edward, and I'm really glad we met."

"Oh same here, Brendan, same here!"
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Brendan gets bullied.

choices: They save Brendan from the smell.
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
About two weeks had passed since Brendan had met Edward, and the bullying incidents have been few and far between. When they did occur, Edward had always shown up to save him, sometimes not as soon as Brendan had hoped, but it was better late than never. He was still in touch with Beth, and decided it was time for her and Edward to meet.

One Friday afternoon, Brendan invited both of his friends to the park, and was waiting for them on the very same bench he and Beth first got to know each other.

Edward was the first to arrive and took a seat on Brendan's right.

"I get to finally meet your girlfriend, sweet!" he said.

"Come on Edward, she isn't my girlfriend." Brendan muttered, and this wasn't the first time he had said that.

"I know, I know. Shes just the other half of the friends you have."

Brendan looked a little hurt by this comment.

Edward didn't realize Brendan would take it so hard. "Whoa, come on Brendan, it was only a joke, but I guess it was in bad taste, I'm sorry."

"I know you didn't mean anything by it Edward, and I guess I was just being overly sensitive, but you're absolutely right about that."

"Come on Brendan! Don't be so down now! I'm sure you'll meet lots of great people, it just takes time! I'm sure a few weeks ago you never expected to meet a good friend by chance at our school, am I right?"

"You're absolutely right again Edward. I just have to keep going on, and its not like that is the only thing about me that'll take time to change. Thanks."

"Hey, don't sweat it Brendan!" Edward replied with his smile.

Not too long after that, Beth arrived. She sat at the left of Brendan once again, and the bench strained under her weight once again.
