Two, I may not be Santa, but I can fit through tight spaces just like any other agent, trust me! Three, there is a way that leads outside, we've studied the layout of this place. Four, we've got people hiding out to fly us to safety. Five, since I know you'll ask, our helicopters can support my big fat ass just fine, thank you!"
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: The steam.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
"...Alright, good enough for me." Melonie said.

With some grunts, stretches, strains, and wiggles, Brendah got herself into the vent. In order to move forward, she kind of had to wriggled and slide, since it was too cramped for her to crawl, but this form of locomotion was easy for her so she was faster than one would expect. After Brendah was in far enough, Melonie sighed and followed on in.

Brendah spoke up after a few moments. "How are you holding up back there Melonie?"

"Crawling in a tight tunnel with nothing to see but metal and your gigantic ass, so I'm peachy." Melonie replied sarcastically, and Brendah giggled a little.

After a few more moments, there was a loud click and the noise of a generator.

Melonie's eyes widened, she knew exactly what was next. "Damn it! Brendah! The steam is about to blow!"

The agent wasn't worried. "And so am I!"

"What does that mea-?" Melonie's eyes widened for a second time from what happened next.

FFFFFFFFFVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV VVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVRRRRTTTTT!!!!!

A loud, very long, raspberry-like fart was released from Brendah's big butt. She smiled with relief (and amusement) from letting it all out, and the entire ventilation system was soon filled with a light-green haze.

Since she was trying to keep up with Brendah, poor Melonie's nose was almost right up to the gassy agent's butt and she was forced to smell it up close. (Not that distance would've mattered. She could've been in the shafts halfway across the building and Brendah's gas still would've reached her!)

Finally Brendah's flatulent fumigation of the ventilation finished.

"Ahhhhhh! That was a good one!" she said with a sigh of relief.

There was a loud thump of Melonie's head slamming on the floor of the shaft.
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Melonie agrees with her.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
"Oh shoot, I must've knocked poor Melonie out! I'm not used to escorting people through these tight spaces, so I guess I forgot about the poor girl! Well at least this way I can bring her through that trap I set since she's already unconscious." Brendah whispered to herself.

Melonie, who was still conscious, just had slammed her head in frustration or annoyance or shock (any sort of cynical response, really). She looked up and gasped on seeing Brendah's butt looming closer to her as she was backing up.

Melonie didn't want to talk because of the stench, so she just groaned loudly (although it came out as more of a desperate sob really).

"Melonie?! You're still conscious?!" Brendah said in surprise.

Wanting to avoid any other close-calls, Melonie pulled the collar of her dress over her nose and held it there tightly with her white-gloved hands.

"Y-yes." she replied with tears building up in her eyes. Her "mask" was hardly doing anything to help, and she didn't want to inhale any more of Brendah's gas than she had to by adding some sarcastic quip.

"Wow Melonie, I'm very impressed! Not even my fellow agents can withstand my gas at such a lethally close-range like that! Especially in such an enclosed area with no escape! Well, except for one." Brendah happily exclaimed, both bragging about her flatulent power and impressed at Melonie's flatulent resilience.

"Yay for me...Now what about the steam?" Melonie was more concerned about the OTHER deadly emission in the shaft than she was about Brendah's "gassing on".

"Hee hee, thats one of the reasons why I let one rip! The steam can't get through my fart gas! Think of it kind of like how the ozone layer works!"

"...Except THIS ozone layer would probably end up destroying the REAL ozone layer in the process." Melonie muttered.

"I was hoping for a reply like that Melonie! Can you still go on, or should we back up and get out another way?"
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Melonie is still awake.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
Melonie gasped loudly and her eyes widened, imagining Brendah's big butt smothering her face as she backed up, releasing noxious farts along the way.

"NO! I can keep going Brendah." the slim snarker exclaimed, sounding way more desperate and frantic than she ever wanted to come off as.

Brendah giggled at Melonie losing her cool. "Okay then! Just to let you know, I might need to fart some more to keep the steam away!"

Brendah was lieing, her farts had more than enough staying power. She just wanted to mess with Melonie for once, instead of the other way around. Melonie groaned loudly upon hearing this, although the groan sounded more like a whine.

They continued their crawl through the toxic (at least for one of them) tunnel until they reached a 4-way split path.

"Wait here Melonie, I need to back up." Brendah said.

Melonie resisted the urge to let out a whi- erm, groan, and Brendah could sense this.

"Hee hee! Don't worry Melonie, my big ol' butt isn't going to squash you! I just need to change directions."

The presented-princess sighed with relief, and still had the collar of her dress pulled over her nose in an attempt to keep out the smell.

Brendah crawled forward a little, then backed up through the path on the left behind her big behind and motioned for Melonie to follow her.

"I'm glad to see your fat face over your colossal cheeks, Brendah." Melonie said with a very slight smile.

"I don't know Melonie, I think my dimples are pretty chubby too!" she replied with a big smile.

They went on forward (and backward?) a little bit before Brendah stopped. Her ass was pressed up against a thick cover that led outside.

PPPPRRRRBBBBBBTTTT!!!!

Brendah blasted a loud low-pitched fart that blew the entire cover into very tiny fragments, and even with the opening to the outside, the fart gas in the vent stayed put.

She wriggled a little until her butt was out of the opening and she slowly slid out. It was about a two-story drop to the ground outside, but her fat flatulent ass was like a mat that broke her fall.

"Melonie, come on! Hurry!" she whispered, motioning the tall woman to follow her.

Melonie groaned, feeling like this was a bad idea, but she already came this far. She slowly slid her lanky body forward out of the opening, and Brendah caught her with her head and arms leaning over the agent's back.

"Well now what?" the brunette moaned.

"Well now I'm sorry Melonie." Brendah said.

"F-for what?" Melonie was slightly worried that this was all some sort of setup for some kind of double-cross.

"For this!" Brendah grinned as she turned away from the base, lifted one of her thick legs up, and...

PPPVVVVVVBBBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLLLBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBVVVVVVBBBBBBBBBBBBBBL LLLLLLLLLBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBTTTTTTT!!!!!

Brendah ripped a loud, very long, sharp, bubbly fart. Light-green gas left her butt and began enveloping the base. Melonie could hear people inside of it coughing and falling to the ground unconscious, and she could see the metal begin to sizzle and melt. This was only brief, because the noxious smell knocked the princess out cold, and the last thing she could hear was the propellers of helicopters, presumably from Brendah's agency.

---

Melonie woke up in...
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Keep going!

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
Melonie woke up in pretty much the exact position she was at currently where Brendah was telling this story: In the Oder mansion on one of the couches and held up against the agent's fat.

"Is this where I am after passing on? A fancy-ass mansion instead of a terrible-ass apartment? Or did I go down and I'm stuck with the woman who did me in through the most humiliating way possible as an ironic punishment?" Melonie said to herself.

Brendah, once again, had a laugh at Melonie's mutterings. "Melonie, you aren't dead, silly! I knocked you out and brought you back to my place!"

"Huh? Why? Don't you have to pretend none of this ever happened and have me REALLY killed if I ever mention it?"

"Hee hee! Oh Melonie, you've watched too many action movies!"

"Considering I just lived through one, only with fart jokes, I don't see whats so inaccurate."

"Well, actually, you are partly right. We do have to knock people we retrieve unconscious before we bring them back so they can't figure out where our hideouts are."

"So the whole interrogation and death threats by your buddies must be fake too?"

"Actually, thats kind of real too. They really wanted to get info out of you, but you weren't waking up, hee hee! I didn't want them to put you through anything, so I managed to convince them to let you come back with me! A special fellow agent of mine is set up to ask us a few things sometime though."

"So you made sure I didn't have to deal with your entourage and tedious questioning? Thanks for doing that Brendah...and for getting me out of there in the first place." Melonie said, sounding sincere for once in her life.

"You don't need to thank me, its what we do Melonie."

"...So I guess its time to go back to my shit apartment now?" Melonie asked, sounding slightly disappointed that her meetup with Brendah had to end so soon, and she had to go back to her old life.

"Actually...thats kind of what I've wanted to talk to you about Melonie." Brendah began. Melonie's attention was caught by the serious and matter-of-fact tone she said this in.

"...And that iiiiiiiis?"

"Melonie, pardon me if it sounds judgmental, but...you don't seem very happy with your life, do you?"

Melonie rolled her eyes. "Boy, you agents are real pros at gathering intel, huh?"

"I'm serious Melonie. I'm not talking about your personality, I'm just getting that feeling from some of the stuff you said. You didn't seem too concerned about any of the dangers you were in or could have gotten into, and I have a feeling you aren't dressed like that because you feel like your life is a fairytale or anything."

Melonie made a long sigh and decided to just pour everything out to Brendah. "...No, I'm dressed like this as a way to kind of mock my younger self...and to mess with people. I wanted to live like a princess when I was a little girl, and life obviously doesn't turn out that way. Otherwise I wouldn't be living in a shit apartment, with a bunch of shit odd-jobs because I just won't deal with people, and have shit for company because people just won't deal with me. That whole kidnapping thing was actually a highlight for me."

"Melonie, you poor poor thing!" Brendah turned a little so she could hug Melonie tightly, squeezing the redhead against her fat even more. Melonie made a long and drawn-out groan, but she did greatly appreciate Brendah's consoling.

The portly woman let Melonie go...Well, let go of her HUG, she still had the princess pulled in her grip.

"I can help you Melonie." Brendah said.

"I don't want a pity donation if thats what you're planning." she replied with a scoff.

"No, not at all! Melonie, I want you to live here."

There was a very long silence.

"...E-even if I accepted that nonsensical offer, I had better know what the catch is."

"There is no catch Melonie, and its a serious offer. Its actually something that would help me too."

"And what would YOU need help with? You don't see your weight problem as a problem, and your gas problem is only a problem for everyone and everything around you. So if I'm supposed to be some live-in fitness instructor-"

"Its my kids."

"You have kids?"

"Yes, two daughters and a son. They are all very well-behaved, responsible, and special to me. Sadly, I am often gone for weeks at a time, and I have to leave them by themselves because-"

Melonie's sarcasm suddenly turned into anger. "There it is, THERE it is! Was this what ALL of this came down to? You were just looking for a babysitter, and since you saved my life, you think I was just going to take your job offering because of it?! I can truly see now why people think agencies are shady! Then again, why would I think anyone would unironically want to actually be friends with me in the first place?!"

"Melonie NO! You got it all wrong! Being friends with you is exactly why I made you this offer! To be blunt with you, if I was only looking for a babysitter, someone like you would be about the bottom of my list of people I'd be looking for! What changed that is I really enjoy being with you Melonie, and I think my kids would feel the same way because of how unique you are! I won't force you to do this, but I want you to at least understand I was never using you."

Melonie's anger changed back into a more passive (well, okay, sarcastic) state. "...I'm sorry for that outburst Brendah. I also really enjoy being with you, which made it hurt more when I thought it was all a lie." she said sincerely, blushing from being so emotional.

Brendah smiled sweetly. "Thank you Melonie, and I'm sorry I made you feel that way. So what do you say?"

"I'd...at least like to meet your kids first." Melonie muttered, knowing this would lead to a huge hug from the huge woman.

As expected, Brendah immediately embraced her tightly and looking like she was going to explode with happiness. (better than exploding with gas at least!) Melonie made a quiet and very long groan, and she probably would've been crushed to death had Brendah not been so chubby.

FFFFVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVTTTTT!

Melonie's groan increased in volume as Brendah let out a high-pitched raspberry-like fart that lasted as long as her hug...and her hug lasted quite awhile!
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Brendah's mansion.

1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.content:
"And thats where our fart joke action movie ends. Its none of your kids business how I grew with the Oder family...Well really it was none of your business how I met them in the first place, but Brendah wanted it." concluded Melonie.

"That was incredible. I never imagined you guys had met in such a crazy way!" Brendan exclaimed.

"Woooooooow, thats so nuts!" Annabelle exclaimed.

"I wasn't expecting things to go down THAT road!" Cassie said.

"Quite the origin story hmm?" Lilly said.

"I never get tired of hearing it!" Samuel said.

"And I never get tired of hearing THIS!" Brad lifted up his left leg and leaned, pointing his butt right at Annabelle and Jackson.

BBBBBBBBBBLLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTT!!

Brad blasted a loud, low-pitched, bubbly fart right at his sister and her boyfriend. Even if it wasn't even Brad's strongest fart by a mile, it still had enough force to blow their hair and vests back.

"Big bro Brad! Eew!" Annabelle jokingly exclaimed.

"You killed the mood with that...I guess thats better than killing US at least!" Jackson jokingly said.

Melonie rolled her eyes and slowly waved a hand in front of her face. "Oh good heavens, what a fart!" she sarcastically exclaimed in a mock-fancy voice. She remembered Brad's butt-bomb bragging beforehand, and she also didn't like how he killed the mood with one.

"Well Melonie wasn't at all impressed, and I can see why. Shes seen what Lora can do! Also, that fart wasn't even that powerful, Brad." critiqued Cassie.

"Are you some sort of fart critic now?" Beth sarcastically asked.

"All I'm saying is there have been way bigger blasts than that by Brad."

"I wasn't trying to blow up the mansion Cassie. That was just a warning shot, and you gotta admit, that was kinda funny." Brad said.

"I thought it was!" Annabelle said.

"Well to be fair, you think that about a lot of stuff, especially farts, so that doesn't mean much." Jackson joked.

"In addition, destroying this manor would be impossible." Lilly added.

"Yeah, if it can withstand the Oder's farts, it can withstand ANYTHING." Melonie said.

"Yep! Even Lora's!" Samuel boasted, slapping his sister on the shoulder. Lora just blushed and groaned a little.

"Can we at least try?!" Lucy asked eagerly.

"Sure, but you kids wont be able to pull it off! Trust me!" Brendah said with a wink.

Beth could read her sister like a book. "...You just want to have a fart contest, don't you?"

"Yes!" Lucy exclaimed, not caring that Beth saw right through her.
1422222222222222222222222122122211222222.title: Their story is over.

choices: Switch the story to another group.

Both Brendan and Melonie groaned loudly. They did NOT want to go through this, especially Brendan, who had suffered through one not that long ago!

"I think you've got some objections there Lucy!" Edward said.

"...Fine, I'll spare them...THIS time that is..." the little girl grumbled.

She stopped suddenly and snapped awake however when she felt her stomach gurgling and knew what it meant, she had gas. For most people this wasn't the anything of concern but Lily wasn't most people. Lily's gas could shatter stone and bend steel and unfortunately the little girl couldn't always control it.
"PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!"
The room shook like an earthquake in the Lily passed gas. She winced as fart her died down and she looked around the room thankful that nothing was broken or knocked over to the left of the first time she had accidentally shattered her furniture her parents had wised up and filled the room only with very solidly built furniture and nothing fragile.
Lily sighed as she continued getting dressed and getting ready for the day depressed by her gas. The worst part was as powerful as her last fart was it wasn't even close to the worst her gas could do. Still she took some heart in the fact that...
